description: Shaw heard a lot about Sean’s assets, and looked wide-eyed at his bulge, “I got a little bit of Italian, but not that much Italian!” Sean assured him, “Well, you’re about to get that much Italian!” In the car on the way to the house, the two muscle studs started off with some show and tell, clearly hot and bothered, but once we arrived, rough play was in order. Sean dominated Shaw’s ass, and both hotties were left satisfied.
title: Sean & Shaw: Bareback
